title: Chicken with figs in a port wine sauce
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons plain flour', '5 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons port wine', '125ml (4 fl oz) dry white wine', '125ml (4 fl oz) chicken stock', '6 dried figs (stems removed)', '2 tablespoons double cream']
